arts.ttl: West Ham United 0-2 Brentford: Bees outstanding against calamitous West Ham
arts.sum: This momentum continued throughout the second half, as West Ham looked completely devoid of ideas, and the attackers were starved of touches. Luckily for Keith Andrews' men, their lack of end product would not come back to haunt them, as the Hammers put in a simply dismal display at home that was met by more boos at the full-time whistle.

arts.ttl: Nuno Espirito Santo admits ‘we have a problem’ after West Ham lose to Brentford
arts.sum: Nuno’s first home match in charge coincided with a planned stay-away organised by supporters’ groups in protest against the club’s board.

arts.ttl: West Ham slump to defeat at home to Brentford as fans stage boycott
arts.sum: Goals from Igor Thiago and Mathias Jensen were enough to secure a first away win of the season for Brentford, who should have won by a lot more.

arts.ttl: West Ham 0-2 Brentford – Player Ratings as Hammers Lucky to Avoid a Thrashing
arts.sum: West Ham 0-2 Brentford Areola:6 Excellent save on 31 mins was followed up by a second save from the subsiqent corner as the Bee’s put Nuno’s defence under serious pressure. His save wasn’t quite enough to keep the ball out of the net on 42 mins. Far too much to do. Walker Peters:4 Started the […] Source

arts.ttl: Premier League share announcement that could cause havoc in West Ham vs Brentford
arts.sum: West Ham's clash with Brentford may be plunged into chaos after an announcement from the Premier League just before kick-off.

arts.ttl: West Ham v Brentford: Premier League – live
arts.sum: ⚽️ Premier League updates from 8pm BST ⚽️ Ten talking points from the weekend | Mail Niall More on that planned boycott, led by fan group Hammers United. They’ve called for fans to stay away tonight, in protest at the club hierarchy. “West Ham was built by working people who stood up for what’s right,” Andy McConnell, joint secretary of Hammers United, told the Evening Standard. “Boycotting this game is a stand in that same tradition — not against the players, but against years of incompetence and broken promises from the very top.” “We have good options and solutions, starting and on the bench” Nuno tells Sky. “It’s a great chance for us to connect with our fans,” he says, and brushes off concerns over a potential fan boycott tonight. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: West Ham United v Brentford | Nuno drops bombshell line up
arts.sum: West Ham’s first home fixture in a month and new coach Nuno Espirito Santo’s first at London Stadium gets underway tonight in an hour and a quarter. arts.ttl: West Ham United v Brentford | Nuno’s starting XI predictions, goals, results
arts.sum: With head coach Nuno Espírito Santo just two games into his Hammers tenure, making predictions as to his likely line up is tricky indeed: having played a practise game with wing-backs during the international break there is the theory that the Hammers will revert to a back three with wing backs. arts.ttl: Brentford XI vs West Ham United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Brentford travel across London to face West Ham on Monday night. They hold a remarkable psychological advantage over their struggling rivals. Impressively, the Bees have won six of the eight Premier League meetings between the clubs. This record includes a victory at the London Stadium last season, giving them huge confidence ahead of this clash. arts.ttl: West Ham United vs Brentford – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: West Ham United play their first home match under new manager Nuno Espírito Santo on Monday night. They desperately seek a victory against Brentford to climb off the foot of the table. Although the Hammers earned a point at Everton in Nuno’s debut, they now face a Brentford side with a strong record against them.
